name: Engineous Games, Inc.
overview:
Engineous Games developed Sketch Nation, a casual game creation technology which allows anyone to create their own games right on their mobile device.

In April 2010, Engineous Games released Sketch Nation Shooter for the iPhone and iPod Touch, a game creator which lets users create their own unique scrolling shooter games on their iPhone and iPod Touch devices.

In October 2010, Engineous Games announced Sketch Nation 2, a new and improved casual game creator that allows anyone to create mobile games in a variety of genres on their mobile device.
